1.text: Get a square piece of paper to make your origami mouse with.

2.text: Fold the paper in half diagonally both ways and then unfold.

3.text: Fold the bottom left and right edges up to the vertical crease and unfold.

4.text: Repeat with the top left and right edges of the paper but don’t unfold.

5.text: Lift the flaps and fold the corners over to the vertical crease.

6.text: Fold one of the flaps down and fold the bottom edge up to the top edge.

8.text: Flip the model over and fold the bottom point up above the horizontal crease.

10.text: Turn the model over and mountain fold it in half lengthwise.

11.text: Fold the flap over and then bring the corner back to make an ear.

12.text: Flip the model over and repeat with the other flap.

13.text: Insert a finger into the ear flaps to make them round and 3-dimensional.

14.text: Fold the long half of the model in on itself to start the tail.

15.text: Bring the end of the tail up and push it inside of the fold you just made.

16.text: Open the tail up and fold the corners in to make it thinner.
